Articles.Content:
Then I'll swap for a smaller, Canadian product.

![toronto1_on.jpg](http://www.jmarcoz.com/sirens/toronto1_on.jpg)

Yes, this thing is

**Made in Canada(R)**

Spoiler

Non-Canadian item counterattack pls

It's my hill.

Spoiler

Have I done a mental / social attack?

**Edited <time datetime="2018-11-28T06:17:21Z" title="11/28/2018 06:17  AM" data-short="5 yr">November 28, 2018</time> by FahmiRBLXian**

A true Kerbal tank with a plugin? addon? captures your hill.

Spoiler

![crocodile5.png](https://www.canadiansoldiers.com/vehicles/flamethrowers/crocodile5.png)

Do you mean using **[Kerbal Foundries](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ)** for both wheels and tank thread? Since you couldn't figure that out... \*Sounds buzzer\*

**My hill.**

> 
> 
> 2 hours ago, FahmiRBLXian said:
> 
> 
> Do you mean using **[Kerbal Foundries](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ)** for both wheels and tank thread?
> 

Why use a tank thread when both KSP & Kerbal Foundries don't have passive wheels?  

That carriage is pushing the tank from behind. The thread is just to brake.

(While you were reading this phrase, somebody has captured the hill.)
I thought you've hit the link. Me and that guy captures the hill.
A day later you realize that that guy has betrayed you and captured the hill for hmself.
And "that guy" is me.

I rain asteroids on you.

my enormous crater.
Then i reversed time, and hurled those asteroids back using telekinesis.
The Newtonian law throws you in opposite direction.
The Kraken altered physics so that nothing happened to me.
Yes. But the altered hill has collapsed into a blackhole.

I find a hill that somebody else captured, slam a piano down on it and play the first dozen notes of “sand canyon 3” so loud that everyone else is stunned. My hill.

<iframe allowfullscreen="true" frameborder="0" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/-zkvFCMzk8U?feature=oembed" width="480"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2019-01-30T19:58:58Z" title="01/30/2019 07:58  PM" data-short="5 yr">January 30, 2019</time> by Fraston**
I return to the hill after a long vacation and find this. I slowly back away and build a new hill right next to my No Man's Sky base.

> 
> 
> On 1/15/2019 at 7:42 AM, GRS said:
> 
> 
> The Kraken altered physics so that nothing happened to me.
> 

Wanna bet?

> 
> 
> 22 hours ago, Fraston said:
> 
> 
> I find a hill that somebody else captured, slam a piano down on it and play the first dozen notes of “sand canyon 3” so loud that everyone else is stunned. My hill.
> 
> 
> 
> <iframe allowfullscreen="true" frameborder="0" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/-zkvFCMzk8U?feature=oembed" width="480"></iframe>
> 

You monster.

By using war crime level weaponry you surrender the hill. Mine.

\*slaps roof of [@Kernel Kraken](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/181383-kernel-kraken/)\* This bad boi can fit so many odd responses inside of it.

\*roof slap also slams you through the ground at 50% of light speed\*

My hill.

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, Fraston said:
> 
> 
> \*slaps roof of [@Kernel Kraken](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/181383-kernel-kraken/)\* This bad boi can fit so many odd responses inside of it.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> \*roof slap also slams you through the ground at 50% of light speed\*
> 
> 
> 
> 
> My hill.
> 

By propelling me at half the speed of light, my particles cause a chain reaction with the ground and the entire hill is destroyed in a large explosion. 

[https://what-if.xkcd.com/1/](https://what-if.xkcd.com/1/)

I mean, really.
Found a new hill...my hill.

I build a new hill in the <abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building">VAB and place it on top of your hill to take it</abbr>. About half the parts are structural panels, the other half are struts.

My theoretically indestructible hill

**Edited <time datetime="2019-02-01T01:45:40Z" title="02/01/2019 01:45  AM" data-short="5 yr">February 1, 2019</time> by 53miner53**
  
Ninja’d
I removed that hill with a very close Tylo flyby, it's gone like a dry pimple being taken off.

I decide to vaporize everything within light-years in a cataclysmic explosion. In the nothingness, I create a hill-planet suspended in a large amount of water.

My ‘moist’ hill.
Your hill got crushed by Immense water pressure, i created a planet with several hills, all of them are MY HILLS.

Your planet was flat, and since gravity is a thing they all crumbled together into a rocky planet.

I mine your planet for resources, build a hill in orbit and then land it back on Earth using NERVA engines. Moy kholm.

**Edited <time datetime="2019-02-10T20:07:21Z" title="02/10/2019 08:07  PM" data-short="5 yr">February 10, 2019</time> by Guest**

I open my mouth reeeeeally wide and expose a bright red eye with a black pupil. I shoot a huge laser out of it, cutting your hill in half and creating a huge gash into the earth from orbit.

My canyon.

Danny.  

I spagetify the planet and build a hill  

my hill.
